# L5R FFG Symbols

Only the SVG versions are stored here.

For the PNG files, see https://github.com/SkyJedi/FFGNDS-Discord-Dice-Roller/tree/master/Emoji/L5R

To use them as a font, see https://www.nucreum.com/l5r/#four

## Usage

### BBCode

1. Follow the instructions of https://www.phpbb.com/support/docs/en/3.3/kb/article/adding-custom-bbcodes-in-phpbb3/
2. Add the four following doublets of snippets

```
[opportunity]
```

```
<svg style="height: 1em;" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 22.568 23.444"><title>Opportunity symbol</title><g fill="currentColor" transform="translate(-83.637 -56.98)"><path d="M91.767 80.268c-.917-.392-1.417-1.351-1.417-2.715 0-1.704.681-2.173 2.92-2.011 1.777.128 1.91.045 2.477-1.564.355-1.007.34-1.127-.253-2.094-.786-1.278-.79-1.422-.051-1.418.387.002 1.035.505 1.852 1.436 1.186 1.352 1.585 2.265.992 2.265-.145 0-.264.34-.264.758 0 .708-1.426 3.848-2.2 4.845-.408.527-3.192.868-4.056.498zm9.96-3.895c-1.27-.508-1.758-2.223-1.024-3.595.263-.49.168-.683-.761-1.55-.584-.544-1.582-1.138-2.218-1.32-1.786-.508-1.759-.704.124-.906 1.294-.139 2.051-.078 2.976.237 1.613.55 3.235 1.515 4.133 2.46.69.725.707.817.478 2.443-.132.929-.335 1.783-.452 1.899-.285.28-2.756.533-3.256.332zM84.41 74.29c-.372-.401-.673-1.119-.75-1.786-.181-1.599.62-2.305 2.614-2.305 1.185 0 1.571.118 2.094.64.352.353.877.717 1.167.809.87.276 2.635-.418 3.464-1.362.425-.485.969-.88 1.208-.88.873 0-.18 3.361-1.28 4.082-.823.54-4.98 1.46-6.626 1.468-1.023.004-1.39-.125-1.891-.666zm4.633-5.427c-.355-.149-1.502-.927-2.55-1.73-1.915-1.467-2.23-1.988-2.23-3.694 0-1.324 1.988-2.573 3.297-2.071.57.219 1.457 1.994 1.682 3.366.165 1.005.305 1.162 1.617 1.827.79.4 1.832.728 2.315.728 1.24 0 1.09.465-.353 1.103-1.49.66-2.91.836-3.778.471zm13.137-1.466a1.774 1.774 0 0 1-.9-1.208c-.15-.757-.22-.8-1.091-.658-.512.083-1.39.52-1.952.972-.565.454-1.256.783-1.547.737-.502-.08-.49-.154.252-1.72.865-1.824.971-1.88 4.657-2.5 1.744-.293 2.03-.275 3.204.205 1.137.465 1.298.631 1.374 1.406.193 1.984-.67 3.193-2.268 3.176-.546-.006-1.324-.19-1.73-.41zm-8.502-.983c-1.289-1.689-1.493-2.532-1.045-4.31.219-.87.777-2.35 1.24-3.291.766-1.558.922-1.719 1.75-1.797 2.366-.226 3.457.64 3.457 2.745 0 1.183-1.349 2.678-2.65 2.938-1.118.224-1.706 1.534-1.493 3.329.183 1.55-.267 1.688-1.26.386z"/></g></svg>
```

```
[strife]
```


```
<svg style="height: 1em;" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 23.789 23.425"><title>Explosive Success symbol</title><g fill="currentColor" transform="translate(-187.808 -87.463)"><path d="M198.557 110.75c-.083-.134-.475-.243-.871-.243-1.407 0-3.416-.708-4.556-1.605-1.569-1.234-3.953-3.614-3.953-3.946 0-.523.703-.261 1.472.548 1.002 1.055 3.126 2.136 4.183 2.129 3.27-.022 6.526-1.004 6.269-1.89-.288-.989-.301-2.908-.024-3.426.83-1.553 3.46-2.078 5.034-1.005 1.396.954 1.91 2.152 1.766 4.123-.133 1.837-.821 2.873-2.318 3.493-.415.172-.823.53-.908.797-.084.266-.535.6-1 .742-1.21.367-4.915.574-5.094.284zm9.72-4.915c1.193-2.425 1.238-2.616 1.184-5.118-.05-2.374-.102-2.584-.931-3.786-.483-.7-1.276-1.461-1.762-1.693-.81-.387-.958-.385-1.802.015-.59.28-1.603.437-2.83.437-1.857 0-1.936-.027-2.914-1.005-1.679-1.68-1.673-4.232.013-5.919.681-.681.919-.749 2.619-.749 1.755 0 1.98.07 3.658 1.15 1.634 1.05 2.57 1.938 4.634 4.39.4.477.921 1.528 1.156 2.338.364 1.252.38 1.73.109 3.213-.176.958-.42 2.388-.545 3.178-.247 1.575-1.424 3.527-2.218 3.68-.265.051-.432-.008-.372-.13zm-17.67-1.758c-.45-.32-1.264-.974-1.808-1.454l-.991-.872.134-2.832c.151-3.187.456-5.208.913-6.043.17-.31.936-.984 1.704-1.497.768-.512 1.753-1.31 2.19-1.774 1.227-1.303 2.665-1.918 4.762-2.037l1.853-.105-1.456.523c-1.139.41-1.78.886-2.953 2.195-1.54 1.72-1.923 2.557-2.215 4.847-.203 1.598.183 2.779.908 2.779.768 0 2.067 1.214 2.41 2.253.488 1.48.006 2.432-1.96 3.87-1.242.91-2.354.956-3.49.147z"/></g></svg>
```

Afterward, writing something like:

```
[success]
[size=200][opportunity][/size]
[color=#FF0000][explosion][/color]
Some text, a [strife] and even more text.
```

Will show up as:

![Custom BBCode display](https://i.imgur.com/IyBaxn6.png)

### React

Assuming a project setup with the like of Create React App and supporting the same features: https://create-react-app.dev/docs/adding-images-fonts-and-files/#adding-svgs

```js
import React from "react";
import { ReactComponent as StrifeSvg } from "./strife.svg";

const Strife = () => {
  return <StrifeSvg className="strife" />;
};
```

```css
.strife {
  height: 1em;
  color: red;
}
```
